data.text: Rekei andũ a Moabi arĩa mehithĩte kwanyu maikare na inyuĩ;
Gĩtĩ kĩa ũnene gĩkaahaandwo na wendo;
Nĩtũiguĩte ũhoro wa mwĩtĩĩo wa Moabi:
Nĩ ũndũ ũcio andũ a Moabi nĩkũgirĩka maragirĩka,
Nĩ ũndũ ũcio nĩndĩrarĩra, ngarĩra o ta Jazeri,
Gũtirĩ gĩkeno kana ndũhiũ mĩgũnda-inĩ ya matunda;
Ngoro yakwa nĩĩracakaĩra Moabi o ta kĩnanda kĩa mũgeeto,
Rĩrĩa andũ a Moabi maathiĩ kũndũ kũrĩa gũtũũgĩru makahooe,
Ũyũ nĩguo ũhoro ũrĩa Jehova aarĩtie ũkoniĩ Moabi.

No rĩrĩ, rĩu Jehova ekuuga atĩrĩ: “Mĩaka ĩtatũ ĩtanathira, ĩtarĩtwo ta ũrĩa mĩaka ya mũndũ wandĩkĩtwo wĩra ĩrĩkanagĩrwo-rĩ, riiri wa Moabi hamwe na andũ ake othe nĩũkanyararwo, namo matigari make makorwo marĩ manini mũno na makahinyara.”
